column4: I've just installed Ubuntu 5.10 (64 bit) onto my laptop. The install was made on a partition with XP, and all works fine. However, when I try to browse the files from Ubuntu of the NTFS drives, I get an error telling me that I don't have the proper permissions. How can I change that?
psychotic: Because I have many openoffice documents I would like to load from the NTFS drive.
it can be done but it's not safe. thank MS for the closed specs of ntfs
